title: František Valošek
text: František Valošek (born 12 July 1937) is a <a href="Czech%20Republic">Czech</a> former <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player who competed in the <a href="1964%20Summer%20Olympics">1964 Summer Olympics</a>. He was born in <a href="Fr%C3%BDdek-M%C3%ADstek">Frýdek-Místek</a>, and played club football in the 1950s and '60s for <a href="FC%20Ban%C3%ADk%20Ostrava">Baník Ostrava</a>, for whom he scored 54 goals in 151 appearances.
